title: BERTScore Architecture

definitions.BERTScore: A metric for evaluating the quality of text by comparing the similarity of BERT embeddings between a reference and a candidate sentence.

summary: The slide presents the BERTScore architecture, a method for evaluating text quality by token matching for precision and recall. It includes formulas for calculating R_BERT, P_BERT, and F_BERT, and illustrates the process with a diagram and a table showing maximum similarity scores.
